title: After The Success Of Manikarnika, Kangana To Focus On Making More Films On Female Warriors!
text:
Kangana Ranaut's last film Manikarnika was controversial, yet successful. Despite all the negativity that surrounded the film, the film managed to shatter a lot of records at the box-office. Be it her acting or her direction, she earned a lot of praises for all the hard-work that she put in for this project.
Twitter
After the success of the film, Kangana is now all geared up and excited to work towards making a trilogy of women warriors. She confirmed this news at the India Today Conclave 2019. Talking about her plans, she added,
Pinterest
"I'm planning a film on women warriors, and taking a trilogy forward. Manikarnika can be the first part and there can be one on Durgawati or Razia Sultan and there are so many of them."
Just a few weeks ago, there were similar reports that claimed how she wants to make a biopic on her own life. She had then said, "The biopic will give a chance to look at my life objectively. It is not an expose of people in the industry. All the episodes will be there. It is on my struggle, which is unusual."
